Package cop3330.exceptions

package cop3330.exceptions
This package contains custom exception classes used throughout the COP3330 project.

These exceptions are designed to handle application-specific error conditions, such as invalid student status, exceeding credit hour limits, or duplicate course enrollment.

  • CreditHourLimitExceededException
  • DuplicateCourseEnrollmentException
  • InvalidStudentStatusException
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    CreditHourLimitExceededException
    Exception thrown when a student attempts to register for courses that would result in exceeding their allowed credit hour limit.
    DuplicateCourseEnrollmentException
    Exception thrown when a student attempts to enroll in a course that they are already registered for.
    InvalidStudentStatusException
    Exception thrown when attempting to instantiate a subclass of the Student class using an invalid or unrecognized student status argument.
